docs.text: Overview My Homelab utilizes Infrastructure as Code and GitOps methodologies to automate provisioning, operating, and updating self-hosted services. This documentation primarily serves as a reference for myself. Some of the content in this will be cross-posted from my personal site .
docs.title: Overview
